languages.text: "Если выживешь, не возвращайся сюда — ведьмы будут мстить, потому хозяин уже покинул Прорву и нашел новых покровителей. Поступи так же. Так сказал хозяин". {n}Монотонность и безошибочность, с которой монстр произносит речь Тервантьяса, напоминает манеру общения сервиторов.{/n}

"Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если выживешь, не возвращайся сюда — ведьмы будут мстить, потому хозяин уже покинул Прорву и нашел новых покровителей. Поступи так же. Так сказал хозяин". {n}Монотонность и безошибочность, с которой монстр произносит речь Тервантьяса, напоминает манеру общения сервиторов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Should you survive, do not return here — the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotonousness and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias's words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

"Should you survive, do not return here — the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotonousness and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias's words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

"Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

"Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

languages.text: « Dans l'hypothèse où vous parviendriez à survivre, ne revenez pas ici : les Cérastes voudront se venger. C'est pour cela que le maître a déjà fui l'Abîme et trouvé de nouveaux protecteurs. Il m'a demandé de vous faire passer le message : il vous conseille de faire de même. » {n}Le ton monotone et pointilleux qu'emploie le monstre en transmettant le message de Tervantias vous rappelle celui des servitors.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans l'hypothèse où vous parviendriez à survivre, ne revenez pas ici : les Cérastes voudront se venger. C'est pour cela que le maître a déjà fui la Faille et trouvé de nouveaux protecteurs. Il m'a demandé de vous faire passer le message : il vous conseille de faire de même. » {n}Le ton monotone et pointilleux qu'emploie le monstre en transmettant le message de Tervantias vous rappelle celui des servitors.{/n}

languages.text: “如果你还能活下来的话，就别再来这里了，那些巫灵打算打击报复，因此主人已经离开了裂隙，寻找新的赞助人了。他建议你也找个新的赞助人，主人就是这么说的。”{n}这只怪物重复特万提亚斯的话时，它既准确、又单调的方式，不禁让你想起机仆的说话方式。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果你还能活下来的话，就别再来这里了，那些巫灵打算打击报复，因此主人已经离开了裂隙，寻找新的赞助人了。他建议你也找个新的赞助人，主人就是这么说的。”{n}这只怪物重复特万提亚斯的话时，它既准确、又单调的方式，不禁让你想起奴工的说话方式。{/n}

languages.text: 「もし生き残ったとしても、ここへは戻ってくるな。ウィッチは復讐を企てるだろう。我が主がすでに裂け目を去り、新しいパトロンを見つけたのもそれが理由だ。お前もそうするよう、我が主は言っている」{n}怪物がテルヴァンティアスの言葉を正確かつ単調に繰り返す様子は、サーヴィターの話し方を思い起こさせるものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もし生き残ったとしても、ここへは戻ってくるな。ウィッチは復讐を企てるだろう。我が主がすでに裂け目を去り、新しいパトロンを見つけたのもそれが理由だ。お前もそうするよう、我が主は言っている」{n}怪物がテルヴァンティアスの言葉を正確かつ単調に繰り返す様子は、サーヴィターの話し方を思い起こさせるものだった。{/n}

languages.text: «Si por ventura sobreviviese, no vuelva aquí: las brujas querrán vengarse, por eso mi amo ya se ha marchado del Abismo y ha encontrado nuevos mecenas. Le sugiere que haga lo mismo. Ese es el consejo del amo». {n}La monotonía y precisión con que el monstruo repite las palabras de Tervantias te recuerda al modo en que se comunican los servidores.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si por ventura sobreviviese, no vuelva aquí: las brujas querrán vengarse, por eso mi amo ya se ha marchado del Abismo y ha encontrado nuevos mecenas. Le sugiere que haga lo mismo. Ese es el consejo del amo». {n}La monotonía y precisión con que el monstruo repite las palabras de Tervantias te recuerda al modo en que se comunican los servidores.{/n}

languages.text: "Solltet Ihr tatsächlich überleben, dann kehrt nicht hierher zurück. Die Hekatari werden Rache nehmen, darum hat der Meister die Kluft bereits verlassen und neue Schutzpatrone gefunden. Ihr solltet es ihm gleich tun. Zumindest empfiehlt das der Meister." {n}Die Monotonie und Genauigkeit, mit der das Monster Tervantias' Worte wiedergibt, erinnern dich stark daran, wie Servitoren kommunizieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Solltet Ihr tatsächlich überleben, dann kehrt nicht hierher zurück. Die Hekatari werden Rache nehmen, darum hat der Meister die Kluft bereits verlassen und neue Schutzpatrone gefunden. Ihr solltet es ihm gleich tun. Zumindest empfiehlt das der Meister." {n}Die Monotonie und Genauigkeit, mit der das Monster Tervantias' Worte wiedergibt, erinnern dich stark daran, wie Servitoren kommunizieren.{/n}

languages.text: "Şayet hayatta kalmayı başarırsanız buraya döneyim demeyin. Viçler intikam isteyecektir... Üstadın Yarık'tan ayrılıp yeni efendiler bulmasının sebebi de bu. Aynısını yapmanızı tavsiye ediyor. Üstat böyle buyuruyor." {n}Canavarın Tervantias'ın sözcüklerini zikrediş şeklindeki monotonluk ve tutarlılık, hizmetörlerin iletişim kurma biçimini anımsatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Should you survive, do not return here: the Wyches will seek revenge, which is why the master has already left the Chasm and found new patrons. He suggests you do the same. So says the master." {n}The monotony and accuracy with which the monster repeats Tervantias' words reminds you of the way servitors communicate.{/n}
